page.name: Flash Arc
page.description: The rough-hewn obsidian this blade is made from will slice through the straps holding on your opponent's armor.  Be careful, though.  It's probably best not to taunt your bandit enemy if he's wearing a pink undershirt.  Just to be safe.

properties.name: Flash Arc
properties.description: The rough-hewn obsidian this blade is made from will slice through the straps holding on your opponent's armor.  Be careful, though.  It's probably best not to taunt your bandit enemy if he's wearing a pink undershirt.  Just to be safe.

page.name: Noxus Fumes
page.description: The destruction of the leagues of undead has made Noxus angry. It's time to take down the Dean!

properties.name: Noxus Fumes
properties.description: The destruction of the leagues of undead has made Noxus angry. It's time to take down the Dean!
properties.complete: You have defeated the Dean of the Necropolis and foiled his plans to overrun Doomwood with this army of undead. It is hard to say if Vayle is friend or foe, but either way, the Darkness Orb is hers... for now.
